vlive.korean: 기사님 세 명이요 - 아가씨 혼자 타면서 왜 세 명이야? There are 3 of us, driver. - Why do you say 3, when you're the only one? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “아기천사즈 칭찬 대파티” (한결, 도현 : H&D)
vlive.english: There are 3 of us, driver. - Why do you say 3, when you're the only one?

vlive.korean: [기사님 극락이요~ 했더니] 그게 누구 파트라고요? [I wanted to go to the heaven] Whose part is that? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [TXT] YO~ 미니’어처’ 만드는 껌딱지즈 ‘어처’구니 없게 귀엽다 YO~ (SOOBIN&HUENINGKAI making miniature food)
vlive.english: [I wanted to go to the heaven] Whose part is that?

vlive.korean: 운전기사가 나였어! I was the one! 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.86
여러분 혹시 기사 보셨나요? Did you see all the articles? 듣기 View video SUNMI : [Full] SUNMI [LALALAY] SHOWCASE
vlive.english: Did you see all the articles?
